document_data.name: Karani
document_data.Description: She wore a brown [[tunic]] with red and blue details, with matching [[trousers]]. She was barefooted, and had a blue bandana wrapped around her head. Karani had blonde hair and light skin.
document_data.Abilities: As was appropriate for the priestess of a war god, Karani was fierce in battle.
document_data.Possessions: Karani owned an [[obsidian]] knife, a magical [[sling]], a very powerful ''[[ring of protection]]'', and two ''[[Quaal's feather token]]s'' (bird and tree).
document_data.Relationships: She maintained a good friendship with the [[paladin]] [[Taxa]], and the two shared many adventures.
